name: Paper Mario: Time Strewn Star
storyline:
Many years ago, a star collided with this planet. It shattered into four pieces, each one landing in a far off place.

Time passed and the star became a legend, a story passed on through the generations. The myth tells that the star was so ancient that things that touched its pieces never grew old.

This was only the tip of the iceberg, as you might say.

The ancient power of the star is said to only truly be rewarded to those who can find all of its pieces, the Star Shards.

The myth also warns of chaos and mixed up time... earning the star its name.

The Time Strewn Star.
